entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Formatter should be configurable for a space before and after curly braces in interpolated string #58015
  • Move Type to .cs file fails #58014
  • Extract method of part of static local method creates non static method causing compile error #58013
  • Consider excluding specific methods from flow analysis rather than all implicitly declared void methods #58012
  • Improve diagnostic when using equality operators for relational patterns #58010
  • Source Generators: Intellisense is sluggish #58008
  • Broken double-checked locking (data race) in RazorDocumentServiceProviderWrapper #58004
  • VS2022 Release: Blazor doesn't show the helpers automatically in many occasions when underlined code from warnings #58002
  • Compiler is not picking up the extension method defined. #58001

Closed

  • Parameterless struct initialization re-uses values #57870
    17.1
  • Update the default language version for Visual Basic/VB to 16.9 #57093
    17.1
  • Crash while editing Syntax.xml #57987
  • CSharpScript with Single File .NET6 not working #57947

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Roslyn.VisualStudio.Setup as a build dependency for integration tests #58018
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pass AnalysisKind instead of int #58017
    Area-Analyzers
  • Update to DiffPlex 1.5.0 #58016
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix branch URLs in Language Feature Status #58011
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Hold Receiver directly in bound node for implicit indexer access #58009
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add feature to convert to file-scoped namespace just by typing `;` after a normal namespace. #58003
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Require definite assignment of all fields if struct includes any field initializers #57925
    Area-Compilers, 17.1.P2
  • Move Default VB Version to 16.9 #57688
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Simplify creation of interpolation text tokens. #57988
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Ensure we cache the previous item when two items are considered equal #57888
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Share '$' logic with the normal lexer and the interpolated string scanner. #57951
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • Attempt to mark EqualityContract property accessor as not auto-implemented #57917
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Do less work during CI checkout #57960
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify 'interpolation' data, and move to an easier to consume System.Range approach for it #57966
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Share '@'-sign logic with the normal lexer and the interpolated string scanner. #57946
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline Hints: VB fix parameter to match colon equal syntax #57712
    Area-IDE
  • Exclude unnecessary sqlite assemblies for .Net 6 host #57977
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Change nullable annotation on CopyAnnotationsTo() #57992
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
